Identifier.name: NHS_NUMBER
Identifier.description: The NHS Number identifier for a patient

Identifier.name: ODS_ORGANIZATION_CODE
Identifier.description: ODS code to identify the organisation at organisation level

Identifier.name: ODS_SITE_CODE
Identifier.description: ODS Site code to identify the organisation at site level

Identifier.name: SDS_USER_ID
Identifier.description: The SDS identifier that uniquely identifies the person as this agent

Identifier.name: SDS_ROLE_PROFILE_ID
Identifier.description: The SDS identifier that uniquely identifies the role profile of the person as this agent
